Title: Establishes the savings bank, savings and loan association or credit union municipal deposit program
Summary: Establishes the savings bank, savings and loan association or credit union municipal deposit program.
LawCode: Amd §§10 & 11, Gen Muni L; add §454-a, Bank L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law and the banking law, in relation to the establishment of a savings bank, savings and loan association or credit union municipal deposit program, and limiting deposits of public funds in such institutions to two hundred fifty thousand dollars
